  • Provide seismic hazard model-related sales support including analytic support, preparation of presentation slides, giving presentations, and participation in meetings with clients and prospects.

Posting Job Requirements
Education, Experience, Knowledge and Skills
  • Ph.D. in an earth-science related field (e.g., seismology, geophysics, geology, engineering seismology, geotechnical engineering).
  • 3-5 years of directly related experience in deterministic and probabilistic seismic hazard analysis (PSHA) and seismic hazard model development.
  • Experience in OpenSHA / OpenQuake probabilistic seismic hazard analysis platform.
  • Experience in Tsunami Modeling.
  • Familiarity with natural hazard catastrophe modeling is essential.
  • Working knowledge of probability theory and statistics is essential.
